name: QA - Panel Fabrication
PRE-START
Check panel delivered is in accordance with dimensions related to fabrication drawings
Check fold locations are correct to Symonite Shop Drawings and existing structure
Ensure correct tooling method used as detailed within fabrication drawings
PANEL FABRICATION
Panel cut to match existing structure / symonite shop drawing
Stiffeners cut to correct length
Panel cleaned / prepared using Aktivator 205 for Sika 522 Adhesive
Stiffeners bonded at correct centres (based on fabrication drawings)
Time taken to allow stiffener bonding to cure as per manufacturer's specification (24hrs)
Gusset installation as per fabrication drawings
QA - Panel Installation
PRE-START
Check structure/frame is constructed in accordance with Symonite shop drawings. Ensure set out centres are correct (1465mm East and West, 1415mm North and South)
Check joinery (by others) and abutments for aligment
Check all flashings (if applicable) installed and fitted as per shop drawings
Check building wrap/RAB/insulation/tenmat fitted as required and defect free
Check presence and correct fitment of any other critical elements
PRE-CLADDING INSTALLATION
Install base / break flashings as detailed in shop drawings (if required)
Install Naideck Tape at weather line penetrations
Install top hat brackets as detailed plumb and level, use correct fixing as per drawings (ensuring embendment within structure as per shop drawings - note this varies per elevation)
Vertical Fixing rails installed as detailed plumb and level, use correct fixing as per drawings
PANEL INSTALLATION
Check panel size and identification is correct for location, no defects
Fix off panels to rails, use correct fixing as per drawings
Install closer / vermin flashings as required
Install sill flashings below windows, with stabiliser brackets
Install stabiliser brackets to window head flashings where required
Install Sealant and backing rod as per shop drawings (ensuring joints do not exceed 20mm)
